iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { FF 75 08 E8 C8 ?? ?? ?? 59 }  // Push + Call + Pop (exit check)
        $pattern1 = { FF 75 08 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Push + Call (ExitProcess)
        $pattern2 = { 8B FF 55 8B EC }               // Function prologue (stack setup)

    condition:
        any of them
}

new_signature_details.name: reads_self
new_signature_details.description: Reads data out of its own binary image
